attributes.title: FarCry 4
attributes.caption: FarCry 4
attributes.description: Joel and Adam play Far Cry 4. Joel is on vacation so Adam gets to write this description. I've been staring at this for 20-30 minutes and can't come up with anything. Jeremy said he'd take over for a minute. Hi this is Jeremy. Far Cry is fun. Moving on... Alright that was pretty good. If there are any more words after this sentence, Matt has decided to weigh in. Why can't we think of a good description for this video I thought we were better than this.

attributes.title: Call of Duty Advanced Warfare
attributes.caption: Call of Duty Advanced Warfare
attributes.description: Being pretty lazy, I just recycled the description from last week... Joel is on vacation so Adam gets to write this description. I've been staring at this for 20-30 minutes and can't come up with anything. Jeremy said he'd take over for a minute. Hi this is Jeremy. Far Cry is fun. Moving on... Alright that was pretty good. If there are any more words after this sentence, Matt has decided to weigh in. Why can't we think of a good description for this video I thought we were better than this. ...Also Kevin Spacey is the Villain in this.

Joel and Adam have a relay race in GTAV., I have been staring at this for 20-30 minutes and can't come up with anything. Jeremy said he'd take over for a minute. Hi this is Jeremy. Far Cry is fun. Moving on... Alright that was pretty good. If there are any more words after this sentence, Matt has decided to weigh in. attributes.title: Maere
attributes.caption: Maere
attributes.description: Joel & Adam were unable to record this week so, we're putting out a previously unreleased episode. You can see all the weight Adam lost, then redistributed to his beard. Thanks for understanding.

attributes.title: Belligerent
attributes.caption: Kim Kardashian: Hollywood
attributes.description: Last week we showed Adam's balls and got surprising little pushback. So this week we thought we would take it up a notch. #Adam'sballs

attributes.title: Sports Friends
attributes.caption: with Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy
attributes.description: Just edit the video they said. "We weren't that loud" they said. "We're all friends" they said. So we tried to prove our friendship by playing Sports Friends.

attributes.title: Dying Light
attributes.caption: with Joel and Adam
attributes.description: Joel and Adam find out what it's like to parkour in the middle of night. As it turns out it's very nice and they have a wonderful time.

attributes.title: Helldivers
attributes.caption: Helldivers
attributes.description: If you like Magicka, then you'll really like watching 4 guys spin their capes around in a circle. I spent two and a half hours on the thumbnail for this video. You'd better watch it or we won't be able to make such perfect thumbnails in the future. Also, Matt smells bad.

attributes.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
attributes.caption: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
attributes.description: Watch as Joel and Adam produce and secrete excessive amounts of bodily fluids.

attributes.title: Evolve
attributes.caption: Evolve
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy dress up like monsters and pretend to hunt each other, also they play Evolve.

attributes.title: The Hidden
attributes.caption: The Hidden Source
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Matt, and Jeremy ask the question on everyone's mind. Who are you I AM THE HIDDEN!

attributes.title: The Order 1886
attributes.caption: The Order 1886
attributes.description: Joel and Adam "play' The Order 1886.

attributes.title: I am Bread Real Life Edition
attributes.caption: I am Bread
attributes.description: Joel and Adam set out to accomplish a simple daily task... as a slice of bread. As it turns out, life is hard for bread
attributes.display_title: I am Bread Real Life Edition

attributes.title: Mortal Kombat X
attributes.caption: Mortal Kombat X
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Jeremy, and Matt split two controllers and fight it out. Holy sh... his HEAD JUST CAME OFF! What the hell is wrong with this game! Oh my god! That's... that's... why! Oh... we just won...

attributes.title: Titan Souls
attributes.caption: Titan Souls
attributes.description: Adam and Joel demonstrate expert team work while showing us how to beat the first four bosses in Titan Souls.

attributes.title: Drawful
attributes.caption: Drawful
attributes.description: Joel, Adam, Jaramy, and Poophead play Drawful. For those wondering, that's an oxford comma. I feel like the Oxford comma is an important part of writing things out in a list, but what do I know. We hope you enjoy, this video.

attributes.title: Stop it Slender
attributes.caption: Stop it Slender
attributes.description: I have to write this description but honestly I have no idea what to put. Adam was mean to me in the last one he wrote so I probably should be mean to him in this one. Adam is stupid and smells not good, also we play Stop it Slender.

attributes.title: Grow Home
attributes.caption: Grow Home
attributes.description: Joel and Adam set off to stick their long green plant thingy into the yellow plant thingy.

attributes.title: Kidz!
attributes.caption: Kidz!
attributes.description: Joel and Adam find some cute fluffy animals and make them nice and clean!

attributes.title: Pet Dinosaur
attributes.caption: Ark: Survival Evolved
attributes.description: You want to know how TO pet dinosaur (Man, we're really glad you asked us such a specific question) Joel SHOWS Adam how TO pet dinosaur. (Now everyone is going to be pet dinosauring.)

attributes.title: Surgeon Simulator
attributes.caption: Surgeon Simulator
attributes.description: Sometimes when you are a surgeon it is okay to yell at your patients because they're asleep and can't hear you. You can tell them anything and they will have no idea. It's like a diary that forgets how mad you are at it.

attributes.title: Kholat
attributes.caption: Kholat
attributes.description: Joel and Adam head to Russia to find out if they are also bad at video games in other countries. As it turns out, they are!

attributes.title: Domesticated Dog Simulator
attributes.description: Woof. Woof woof woof. Arf. AROOOOOOOOOO woof. BACON. woof. bark. bark. sniff sniff sniff. woof. arf arf. ARRRRRRRRRR

attributes.title: Joel and Adam Stream Terraria Part 1
attributes.description: In this recorded live stream, Joel and Adam play Terraria. Joel hates robots, and emojis, but loves caps lock.
attributes.display_title: Joel and Adam Stream Terraria Part 1

attributes.title: Terraria Martian Madness
attributes.caption: This is seriously a guide for the martian madness event in Terraria. We're not being sarcastic damnit, we're showing you how to do hard stuff easily.
attributes.description: This is seriously a guide for the martian madness event in Terraria. We're not being sarcastic damnit, we're showing you how to do hard stuff easily.

attributes.title: Batman
attributes.caption: SPOILER ALERT: WE SPOIL A LOT OF THINGS IN BATMAN ARKHAM NIGHT IN THIS VIDEO. Also, Adam isn’t around so this should be nice and relaxing, enjoy.
attributes.description: SPOILER ALERT: WE SPOIL A LOT OF THINGS IN BATMAN ARKHAM NIGHT IN THIS VIDEO. Also, Adam isnt around so this should be nice and relaxing, enjoy.

attributes.title: #KILLALLZOMBIES Live at RTX
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam have to cooperatively survive waves of increasingly difficult zombies. Unfortunately, they don't know how to work together so Adam just keeps hitting triangle
attributes.description: Joel & Adam play #KillAllZombies on Center Stage at RTX. #KAZ out on Xbox One this fall.

attributes.title: Lego Worlds with Gracie!
attributes.caption: In this episode of How To, Joel and Adam compete to see who can construct a house faster; Joel and Adam, or a 7 year old.
attributes.description: In this episode of How To, Joel and Adam compete to see who can construct a house faster; Joel and Adam, or a 7 year old.

attributes.title: Galak-Z
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam fly gracefully through space in Galak-Z. Joel is away on vacation and Adam misses him very much. Joel won’t respond to any of his texts. :’(
attributes.description: Joel and Adam fly gracefully through space in Galak-Z. Joel is away on vacation and Adam misses him very much. Joel wont respond to any of his texts. :(

attributes.title: Alien Isolation at RTX
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam are at RTX and they show you how to stand gaming up. We apoligize for the quality at the beginning of the video! (...and also for Kara).
attributes.description: Joel and Adam are at RTX and they show you how to stand gaming up. We apoligize for the quality at the beginning of the video! (...and also for Kara).

attributes.title: Dungeon Hunter V
attributes.caption: Adam and Joel crawl through dungeons in this week’s How To! Adam likes himself some big swords. Thanks to Gameloft for making this video possible.
attributes.description: Adam and Joel crawl through dungeons in this weeks How To! Adam likes himself some big swords. Thanks to Gameloft for making this video possible.

attributes.title: Mad Max
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam play Mad Max and discover that maybe Max is just misunderstood.
attributes.description: Joel and Adam play Mad Max and discover that maybe Max is just misunderstood.

attributes.caption: I was supposed to write something here but I’ve forgotten what it was.
attributes.description: I was supposed to write something here but Ive forgotten what it was.

attributes.title: Star Wars Battlefront
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam got a couple of days head start into the Battlefront beta and wanted to give you guys a quick look of three maps.
attributes.description: Joel and Adam got a couple of days head start into the Battlefront beta and wanted to give you guys a quick look of three maps.

attributes.title: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam set out to raid tombs but end up talking about the Mummy and Billy Zane for 40 minutes.
attributes.description: Joel and Adam set out to raid tombs but end up talking about the Mummy and Billy Zane for 40 minutes.

attributes.title: Akiba?s Trip 2
attributes.caption: Adam and Joel go on a virtual tour of Japan, complete with stealing peoples clothes and anime girls!
attributes.description: Adam and Joel go on a virtual tour of Japan, complete with stealing peoples clothes and anime girls!

attributes.title: Wolfenstein The Old Blood
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam are playing Wolfenstein and kill some Nazis. Also, there is robot circumcision.
attributes.description: Joel and Adam are playing Wolfenstein and kill some Nazis. Also, there is robot circumcision.

attributes.title: Resident Evil
attributes.caption: Adam and Joel play Resident Evil HD Remastered Edition. Then they realize they suck at it, and decide to play some other Resident Evils. Also, the video is sideways at first. That’s on purpose.
attributes.description: Adam and Joel play Resident Evil HD Remastered Edition. Then they realize they suck at it, and decide to play some other Resident Evils. Also, the video is sideways at first. Thats on purpose.

attributes.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam set out as Lara Croft to raid some tombs. While doing so Joel talks about his Australia trip and and amputated penises.
attributes.description: Joel and Adam set out as Lara Croft to raid some tombs. While doing so Joel talks about his Australia trip and and amputated penises.

attributes.title: The Crew: Wild Run Edition
attributes.caption: Thanks to Ubisoft for sponsoring this video! Joel and Adam have a competition to see who is the ultimate driver. The answer here is obvious. Click here to see the game’s trailer! http://bit.ly/1jEP4Wn
attributes.description: Thanks to Ubisoft for sponsoring this video! Joel and Adam have a competition to see who is the ultimate driver. The answer here is obvious.

attributes.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
attributes.caption: Joel and Adam left for the day and forgot to write a description for this video so I have to write it. Hi, I’m Alec by the way. Anyway there’s this video. Adam does some light reading while Joel tries to remember how to open his briefcase. The locking mec
attributes.description: Joel and Adam left for the day and forgot to write a description for this video so I have to write it. Hi, Im Alec by the way. Anyway theres this video. Adam does some light reading while Joel tries to remember how to open his briefcase. The locking mechanism is slightly complicated. Its an in depth look into what makes a man tick. Man, I just ate a buffet for lunch and I do not feel well.

attributes.title: Rockband
attributes.caption: So Joel and Adam were all like, “ALEC! EDIT THIS VIDEO!” Then they locked me in a room and left for Thanksgiving break.
attributes.description: So Joel and Adam were all like, ALEC! EDIT THIS VIDEO! Then they locked me in a room and left for Thanksgiving break. While I wait for everyone to get back to work from the long weekend, check out Joel and Adams tribute to Freddie Mercury and themselves. If anyone has left over turkey can you send me some All Ive had is a half empty can of soda thats been sitting on the table for awhile. It wasnt even fizzy.

attributes.title: Worlds Hardest Game Part 2
attributes.caption: In this video, Joelgurt and Adam bash their faces on the keyboard for an entire day to bring you 15 minutes of content. We hope yougurt enjoy!
attributes.description: In this video, Joelgurt and Adam bash their faces on the keyboard for an entire day to bring you 15 minutes of content. We hope yougurt enjoy!

attributes.title: Fallout 4 Companion Guide
attributes.caption: Watch this fucking video on companions in Fallout 4, please. (That sentence was written on the fly by a group of ten people…Two people.)
attributes.description: Watch this fucking video on companions in Fallout 4, please. (That sentence was written on the fly by a group of ten peopleTwo people.)

attributes.title: The Witcher 3
attributes.caption: In this video Joel and Adam play the Witcher 3. As a side note, a week ago Joel told me he was going out to get some groceries. He hasn’t come back. He missed the movie last night. We miss him. Please come back Joel, please.
attributes.description: In this video Joel and Adam play the Witcher 3. As a side note, a week ago Joel told me he was going out to get some groceries. He hasnt come back. He missed the movie last night. We miss him. Please come back Joel, please.

attributes.caption: Joel and Adam get motion sick and get mad at each other. They also play this video game.
